response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $15,000. Considering this, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can collaborate soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
